key.name: volume-overdrive
key.description: This value allows Laine to change the upper limit for the volume slider. It doesn't have a upper value set, but increasing it manually beyond 150% is proably inadvisable.

key.name: show-port-label
key.description: Show labels describing the currently selected port.

key.name: merge-controls
key.description: Show controls as part of aggregate menu instead of in seperate dropdown.

key.name: open-settings
key.description: Add a menu entry to open a configuration tool for pulseaudio, like pavucontrol

key.name: app-settings
key.description: The application to configura pulseaudio to open, default to pavucontrol.

key.name: icon-position
key.summary: Controls where the icon is inserted
key.description: The icon is inserted next to the aggregate menu, regardless of when it is loaded. This is kinda agressive, if another extension tries to load an icon in the same position, then this listens for that and moves its icon closer again. But if another extension has the same idea, then it becomes a recursive loop...
